alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 2:20PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mineral and west central Sanders Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thompson Falls, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thompson Falls, Belknap, White Pine and Trout Creek. This includes Highway 200 W between mile markers 30 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region
